trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered pair of integer x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.
To convert a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> to a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Implicit%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that specifies the coordinates for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> class using coordinates specified by an integer value.
The low-order 16 bits of the `dw` parameter specify the horizontal x-coordinate and the higher 16 bits specify the vertical y-coordinate for the new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
A 32-bit integer that specifies the coordinates for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> class with the specified coordinates.
The horizontal position of the point.
The vertical position of the point.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Add%2A> adds the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Size> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of the specified point.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to add.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> to add
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that is the result of the addition operation.

Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by rounding the values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to the next higher integer values.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> this method converts to.
Represents a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that has <xref href="System.Drawing.Point.X"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.Point.Y"></xref> values set to zero.
Specifies whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> contains the same coordinates as the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to test.
`true` if obj is a and has the same coordinates as this .
Returns a hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.

You should avoid depending on <xref:System.Drawing.Point.GetHashCode%2A> for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Point> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
This behavior could change in a future release.
An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> is empty.
`true` if both <xref href="System.Drawing.Point.X"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.Point.Y"></xref> are 0; otherwise, `false`.
Translates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by the specified amount.
The amount to offset the x-coordinate.
The amount to offset the y-coordinate.
Translates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.

This method adjusts the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of this <xref:System.Drawing.Point> to the sum of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of this <xref:System.Drawing.Point> and `p`.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> used offset this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by a given <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to translate.
A that specifies the pair of numbers to add to the coordinates of pt.
The translated <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> objects.

The result specifies whether the values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point.X"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.Point.Y"></xref> properties of the two <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> objects are equal.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to compare.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to compare.
`true` if the and values of left and right are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> objects.

The result specifies whether the values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point.X"></xref> or <xref href="System.Drawing.Point.Y"></xref> properties of the two <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> objects are unequal.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to compare.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to compare.
`true` if the values of either the properties or the properties of left and right differ; otherwise, `false`.
Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by the negative of a given <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to translate.
A that specifies the pair of numbers to subtract from the coordinates of pt.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that is translated by the negative of a given <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.

Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> object by rounding the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> values to the nearest integer.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> this method converts to.
Returns the result of subtracting specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Subtract%2A> subtracts the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Size> from the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of the specified point.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to be subtracted from.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> to subtract from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that is the result of the subtraction operation.
Converts this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to a human-readable string.
A string that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> by truncating the values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> this method converts to.
Gets or sets the x-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
The x-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
Gets or sets the y-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
The y-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
